name: The Factory (itch) (Jotlane)
description:
Fullscreen button at the bottom right for the best experience

Come get your 15 minutes of fame. This isn't a game. This is your art. Send me screenshots of the final page. We want to see it.

"What's great about this country is that America started the tradition where the richest consumers play essentially the same things as the poorest. You can be watching TV and see The Factory, and you can know that the President plays The Factory. Liz Taylor plays The Factory, and just think, you can play The Factory, too." - Andy Warhol

Music credits:

Sneaky Snitch by Kevin MacLeod
